description: The $PESCO token is the core fuel that powers the entire PescoTavern Ecosystem. From purchasing lottery NFTs to participating in governance decisions. 🔹 Utility: Buy lottery NFTs 🖥️ using $PESCO. Staking: Earn $PESCO rewards by staking NFTs in dedicated pools after each lottery 💰. Governance: Use $PESCO to participate in community votes and decisions regarding the future of PescoTavern 🗳️. Exclusive Benefits: Holders of $PESCO will unlock special rewards, bonuses, and perks within the ecosystem 🎁. Join us in shaping the future of digital lotteries, where $PESCO isn't just a token—it's your key to endless opportunities and rewards.
